THOS. SADLER
Counsellor at Law, Notary Public & Commissioner of Deeds,
FOR NEW YORK, MASSACHUSETTS AND OTHER STATES,
OFFICE, No. 11 WALL STREET,
NEW-YORK.
February 14. 1863.
His Excellency
James F. Robinson
Govr &c. &c. &c.
Dear Sir:
I am desirous to obtain the appointment of Commissioner of Deeds for the State of Kentucky.
I am Commissioner for 17 States, and am often called upon to take acknowledgments, affidavits &c. for your State.

I should be pleased to have the appointment if there
is a vacancy -- if not, if you will please bear my application in mind when any vacancy occurs.

Very respectfully
Your obedient Servant.
Tho. Sadler.

New York
Comr of Deeds
Tho. Sadler
City
Com Issd Feby 19 1863
